title: Game Or PC Crashes
body: So recently I've been playing with my friend and once he gets in the game and it says welcome to summoner's rift his laptop or game crashes he can usually get back but after he couldn't open his league until the game ended. I'm trying to help him out here but I can find any solution into why he keeps crashing. If someone could help me out I'd appreciate.

replies.body:
Heya there!

**Let's try these two guides :**

I can recommend you to follow the steps of [game crashes to desktop (Bugsplat) ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005275568-Game-crashes-to-desktop-Bugsplat-) guide.

There is also, [bug Splat and game crashes ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide, that you, and your friend may want to read.

Keep us posted if that works out for him.

Ayyyy Lindow with the assist!

It's likely that your friends client may have some damaged or missing game files which are causing those crashes. Between the two guides Lindow mentioned, you should be able to get your friend up and running again, but definitely hit me back up if not!
